title: Redneck Miller (1976 Action) He's a good ol' boy...but he's got a mean streak

sources.title: Redneck Miller (1976 Action) He's a good ol' boy...but he's got a mean streak
sources.description:
Miller's motorcycle gets stolen, used in a drug heist. Gangster Supermac threatens him. Miller confronts drug thief rival, fights to retrieve bike. His girlfriend presumed dead reappears safe at the end.

Director: John Clayton
Writers: W. Henry Smith, Joseph A. Alvarez
Stars: Geoffrey Land, Sydney Rubin, Steve Jones, Paul Walsh, Paulette Gibson

Genres: Action, Crime, Drama
Release date: 24 November 1976
Filming location: North Carolina, USA


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
